devdoc.author: Accelerate Finance
devdoc.details: Manages the deployment of vaults and associated escrow contracts.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the VaultRouter with escrow and vault factory addresses.

params._escrowFactory: Address of the escrow factory contract.
params._vaultFactory: Address of the vault factory contract.

deployVault((uint64,string,string,addres.details: Deploys a new vault using provided deployment data.

getVaultInfo(uint64).details: Retrieves information about a deployed vault.

params.vaultId: The unique ID of the vault.

returns._0: VaultInfo struct containing details of the vault.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: VaultRouter

deployVault((uint64,string,string,addres.notice: Only the owner of the associated RBF contract can deploy a vault.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to deploy new vaults and retrieve vault information.
